row.process:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SQL User" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Connection String" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Driver JAR URI" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Driver Class" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Interval" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Number of Connection Retries" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CONN_RETRY#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DB Name" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DATABASE_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Name of the user to create" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CREATE_USER_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Map user to login name" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_LOGIN_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Default schema" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_USER_DEFAULT_SCHEMA#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail if exists" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FAIL_IF_EXISTS#
